website_summaries.verdict: Gives your loveseat a new look, and it's easier to install than the 1-piece by the same manufacturer.
pros: 2-piece loveseat cover features small checked pattern and fits furniture 57" to 70" wide
Comes in black, blue, chocolate, coffee, dark blue, dark cyan, dark magenta, gray, ivory white, light khaki, light yellow, wine, and yellow green
85 percent polyester, 15 percent spandex jacquard fabric
Machine wash cold, tumble dry low
cons: Doesn't fit over-stuffed style furniture well
Some report small holes in fabric after light use

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the dark blue two piece cover to replace the chocolate one piece cover I was using previously. The material and feel is the same on both and both took an equal amount of time to set up. I prefer the look of the two piece, it looks cleaner and more polished around the seat cushions. Package arrived on time, material is nice and stretchy, and the blue is a very nice color. The white straps shown in one of the photos are separate.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: When it first arrived, I wasn't overly pleased with the look but it would be easier to clean then my microfiber couch. It's thinner then I thought it would be and uglier. Getting it on the couch was actually pretty simple. I was able to do it on my own in less than a five minutes. My biggest complaint is that it didn't hold up to washing. After the first wash, it already had the appearance of being washed a dozen times. After a few more washes it started to tear at the seams. It just looked awful. We maybe got a few months of use out of it. I would try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Youaremysunshine

customer_reviews.title: No more awful plaid!
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as stretchy as I'd like it to be/a bit too baggy for the arms of my particular loveseat. Think if the arms were bulkier the cover would fit perfectly--no the slip cover's fault though. Great color (the gray is a dark slate blue-gray), super easy to put on, seems like it'll stay in place well, fabric is comfy. Before and after photos attached.
customer_reviews.author: Jl

customer_reviews.title: It did the job, but not too impressed
customer_reviews.text: I needed to cover an ugly chair and it did the job, but the fit isn’t all that great. My chair was on the larger end of the size that it would fit and it still fits very loosely, and it’s near impossible to get it to look anything like it does in the picture. Also the material is pretty thin, so if you have a pet that is likely to sit on it, I would expect some snags very early on.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these slipcovers, they are super soft and easy to put on. They stay in place and don't hold my cat's fur. I ordered the blue which is actually a really lovely deep teal and it is exactly what I was looking for I will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Very nice better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Very nice better than I expected , Good quality, nice fit I would definitely recommend this item. I did need help putting it on and as it turned out a ten yr. old girl took over and put it on by herself after looking up the installation video on the item posting using her smart phone. What they say is true if can't do it just ask a kid with a computer.. BTW my kitty likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: Noah's Ark.

customer_reviews.title: Great, Inexpensive Fix and doesn't look inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: It takes some work and a little love, but once you have this cover in place, you can't tell it was the original fabric. I had a not-so-typical shaped chair I needed to put it over and I am so happy I went this route instead of a full reupholstery, much cheaper and I am happy with the result. I did not need to use upholstery pins, but I could see how someone may want to, in order to get the tightness he or she wants to achieve. Pictured is the chair before the cover and then it after the cover (oh and don't mind my cute puppy Bandit!) Happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Wells

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item worth the money. The only downfall Is I do not like that cushions are not secure with a half wrapped elastic meaning the cover just sits over the top and sides I really wish the description said that. It would definitely be better if the seat part was like an actual slip in instead of what it is.
customer_reviews.author: I love to shop

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Small price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in dark blue to cover my ugly 1992 white and floral hand me down couch and loveseat. You know the ones that your grandma and mom used to have 😂😂😂 these are soft and very stretchy! I love how well they covered the t shaped cushions on them! Even though they are really stretchy you cannot see the white fabric of the couches through these covers! There's no holes in them either. I saw a lot of reviews for them and they had holes. The back of the covers has a red tag on the outside of them that says BACK. Overall these are amazing quality for the low price and I'm very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Easy, stretchy, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Update** The cover is not durable, mine has several holes now. Also everything is sticking to it. It was a good fix for the time. We love this! So easy to put on, very sofa and stretchy, grey color as expected. We have a 92 inch Sofa and the sofa size cover fits great. It is not very think and seemingly see through but we have a white couch underneath so no problem but I imagine if you have a large burgundy couch and the fabric has to stretch its max you may be able to see the color through it. Otherwise an easy perfect fix to a messed up previous cover.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Couch facelift!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have an old couch on its last leg. As a last resort I ordered this cover. It is a beautiful soft and cozy cover. Our couch has separate back cushions so I was not sure if this was going to work. The Verdict is good. The cover stretched right over the cushions and fits pretty good in my opinion. verdict is good. The cover stretched right over the cushions and fits pretty good in my opinion. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who needs a facelift for the couch. Price was good and the quality seems good too.
customer_reviews.author: joc630

customer_reviews.title: Like having a new couch!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Good price, I will probably order a gray one once my walls are repainted.
customer_reviews.author: A.Garner

customer_reviews.title: Soft slip covers but color doesn’t match
customer_reviews.text: I bought slip covers for my chairs and couch because they are looking the worse for wear. I got dove grey for all three and as you can see by the photo, the chairs are dove grey and the couch isn’t. The package the slip cover cane in for the couch says it is dove grey though. These slip covers were easy enough to put on and they are very soft. I’m bummed the colors don’t match though! I know my ottomans look odd with the cream bottom half - I used the chair cushion slip cover to put on the ottoman instead of the chairs 😁 I’m keeping the slip covers because it’s better than it was.
customer_reviews.author: MiddyBlue

customer_reviews.title: Sofa cover fit, love seat cover did not
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for my sofa in chocolate and one for my love seat in coffee. My love seat has t-shaped cushions and the cover did not fit. The cushion part was too small and the part for the body of the love seat was too big. There was about four inches of extra fabric hanging from the arms of the love seat. I returned that one. The sofa cover fit great!! The color is weird, not what I would call chocolate but more like a dark burgundy. It isn't ugly enough to return so I kept that one. Overall, these are just o.k. in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Beelady

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for fur parents!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this couch cover!! It was exactly what I was looking for! No complaints at all. It is a beautiful gray color and looks exactly like the picture. A large fits our three cushion couch perfectly. I highly recommended it for anyone who has dogs and wants something that is washable and pretty easy to get on and off! We have been using ours for over a week now and it hasn’t slipped off at all! Even with us sitting on it regularly and the dogs playing in it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Anna Nace

customer_reviews.title: It Stays in Place!
customer_reviews.text: I have a beautiful C&B arm chair with down filled cushions that I basically live in and I have cats. They liked it too but for other reasons. Bought a slip cover that didn't last and it ALWAYS need adjusting. This one is amazing in how it stays in place and while the fabric isn't something I'd put on the top of my list, the cats leave it alone. Haven't washed it but expect no problems. The chair has a detachable seat cushion and a back cushion and I used the cushion cover on the back one. Worked just fine! It fits so well and if you're looking for good fit and durability, you'll be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sofa Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic sofa cover! I purchased the gray cover and it fits my old sofa like a glove! There are no wrinkles etc. The color presents as a solid medium gray, and it totally blocks out the original floral print upholstery. We intend to sell our house and thought we wold have to stage our home with a new sofa! Instead, this works great! Without all the additional cost! I simply gathered up excess material under the sofa cousins (out of sight) to eliminate wrinkles - simple to do. The cover grips well to the upholstery, so no slipping or sliding. Exceptionally pleased with the outcome. Picture attached.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Virginia Professional

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fit and good fabric.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say anything bad about this cover because it makes my seat so much comfier and the fabric is well made. The color gray that I ordered is wonderful and I’m really pleased with this. I plan to order more if I need anything else like this in the future. Thanks for the product. I’m really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Suzears

customer_reviews.title: Liked but my chair needed medium not small
customer_reviews.text: Color and fabric fine, but even though the size chart matched, the cover was not wide enough at the top. Also ordered a medium for my loveseat, following the chart, and same problem, even though the two pieces of furniture are not a set nor by the same manufacturer or style.Upshot, I like them and just ordered a large for the loveseat and will use the medium on the chair. I can use the small for another chair or maybe give to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Morsman

customer_reviews.title: good once you figure it out
customer_reviews.text: *********okay so once i actually figured out how to put it on i added two stars because it does look cute. i just wish it came with instructions******** this comes with no instructions whatsoever other than stupid pictures that don’t help. i’ve been trying to get it on my loveseat for 45 minutes and the seams make no sense whatsoever. waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: C Span

customer_reviews.title: Fits t-cushions. Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I love this slipcover. Pretty good price for a 2 piece cover. I wouldn't have even bothered with a 1 piece cover. Feels like I got a whole new couch. Fit my t-cushions just fine. Took a lot of adjusting to get it to fit right. I have back cushions as well so it was kind of tricky to keep the back cushions up while tucking the lower cushions underneath. Great cover. Already reccomend my mom to buy one as she has out dated floral couches also.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Walden

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not true to the color advertised. Significantly less green and not as vibrant either. I measured the couch and got the appropriate size but it seems the way this couch was designed just isn’t accommodating to any couch that isn’t shaped exactly as the one shown. I assumed the stretchy fabric would work if it was within the dimensions shown for that size, but I am now disappointed. The fabric itself is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Nice Covers!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bonded leather couch that is starting to peel, however everything else is still good so I do not want to purchase a while new couch. I started to research slip covers and ordered one for the couch and loveseat in October. So far I love them. There is no slipping and they were rather simple to put on after I realized one side was marked back! I ordered the brown which is almost an exact match for the couch color. They are very soft and are durable so far. I have not washed them yet because we are rarely in the living room, but will update when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Gates

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: Update 10/27/2019: I have bought two of these covers now (first one for a couch and the most recent one for a loveseat) and I'm still SO impressed with the quality! The first one I purchased has been on for about 8 months now; it's been washed/dried several times and it still looks just like the brand new one! I will definitely purchase more if/when I want to change up the color! Original review: This cover is beautiful! It fits like a glove, washes up really nice, and seems like it will hold up for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F

customer_reviews.title: BUY ONE SIZE UP!
customer_reviews.text: It is a soft material and very stretchy just as described, but the sizing seems to be off. I would recommend ordering a size up, so you can tuck in more detail for a custom look. Plus, it is so much easier to install when you have more material to work with. We ended up using the regular sofa size for our loveseat, and ordered the XL sofa size for the regular size sofa. Just order one size bigger and this will save a ton of frustrations. I also see a hint of a lavender undertone in the sunlight when it hits the grey color. It’s actually pretty and works well with my teal and white decor.
customer_reviews.author: TheQuietRioter

customer_reviews.title: The material was perfectly fine, and the color was nice
customer_reviews.text: The material was perfectly fine, and the color was nice. However, there was no way that cushion cover was going to fit my T-shaped cushion. I realize this was designed for a square one, but someone had commented that it fit his T-shaped, so I thought I'd give it a try. Nope, not even close. Honestly I don't see how it fits a square one either! So if you choose this cover, just know that it may not fit what it says it will, or what anyone else says it fit for them. It is a nice cover, provided it fits.
customer_reviews.author: duckgirl

customer_reviews.title: excellent!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have this cover for almost a year and have two cats and three kids and this cover is holding up really nicely! I washed it a few times and it comes out looking like new and fits my couch perfectly. I like that there is a separate cover for the couch pillows and it doesnt slip away and stays put no matter how much we sit on it. I very happy with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone who needs to cover their couch.
customer_reviews.author: miribn

customer_reviews.title: attracts all types of hair
customer_reviews.text: This slipcover looks great and doesn't move. The reason I am giving it 3 stars instead of 5 is that everything sticks to it! Cat hair, Dog hair, Human hair, everything sticks to this slipcover, and it doesn't come off either. So keep that in mind if you have a pet or a toddler or you yourself plan to be around this thing. It will never look clean no matter how many times you vacuum it or wash it. With that being said it fits great and doesn't move.
customer_reviews.author: Jen M

customer_reviews.title: Loose, white looks like a Jersey material sheet set
customer_reviews.text: IMO the white on this couch was bad bc it shows underlying darker color through it, did not help that it was loose bc it looked like a bedsheet to me, however it would have been better if the cushion covers were larger in order to wrap around/under them more. I Ordered XL & it was too big/loose for my 94” long couch. Since the pattern is little textured squares it makes it obvious that it’s a slip cover bc they stretch unevenly & if constantly be having to reline them up. A darker color or with a different couch may look better. The material is soft & very stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Lasts years
customer_reviews.text: I have had the chocolate couch cover for 4 years now. It's durable and easy to clean. I washed mine on delicate and hung the cushion cover out to dry, but dried the couch section in the dryer. I need a new one, only because someone burned a hole into ours while they were house-sitting. I definitely recommend this if you are looking to spruce up an old couch, or keep a new one looking new.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Stained and clearly used.
customer_reviews.text: Clearly used. There is multiple stains on it. Bright orange ones. I was going to let it slide if they didn't show through the other side but they clearly do. No tag that said back like others described. So obviously it was not new. I am requesting a new one so that I can cover my couch and send the old one back.
customer_reviews.author: helen hagan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: A quality item that easily stretched over my couch, even though it has very large arms! I am glad I spent a little more money and purchased this item. It will hold up in the washing machine and is easy to use. Just remove your cushion, put the cushions in their separate cover, then put the main cover on your couch. Replace cushions and viola, it's like you have a new couch!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Bought these to cover an old brown couch. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love these couch covers. It comes in two piece, one for the couch and one for the cushions. They gave the sofa a whole new look and feel. I bought the grey one and its actually more of a blue- grey in person but still nice. I was wanting to throw the couch out but these cover made me consider keeping it after the new look it gave the couch. These were "couch hugging" and I didnt experience any sagging or extra fabric. They stay in place pretty well. I moved and threw the couch out but I washed these covers and will be giving them to my parents. They washed pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: kazua

customer_reviews.title: Yes indeed!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I LOVE this slipcover! Moved to a new house and my favorite chair n half was beige flowers and didn’t match new decor. Instead of buying 2 new chairs at $500/ea, paid $34 for this 2 piece slipcover. Looks terrific. Easy to place, seems to stay in place, perfect color. Love so much I bout Another for my 2nd chair n half ( the dog’s) and a larger one for my 3 seat sofa. Buying the 2 piece looks more custom than the 1 piece. I highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Just what you see in the picture
customer_reviews.text: great product for what you see. installs just as easy as it looks. I ordered it in steele blue and i thought it was going to be more gray, but it looks exactly like baby blue. Only thing im not too happy with is the price. I feel like it's overpriced for basically just a huge couch sock. Could be like $25, same you would pay for a more durable,protective mattress cover. overall good product and you get exactly what you see in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase. My leather couch has seen better days but I can't afford to buy another one. This has given it a new life, and looks fantastic! The cushion cover is a bit small, but thanks to another buyer I bought some sheet clips (the kind you use on your bed sheets) and haven't had any issues. Bought another one for my recliner and now all my furniture matches. Awesome buy.
customer_reviews.author: A.Haas

customer_reviews.title: Great little cover
customer_reviews.text: I had low hopes for this, it was pretty cheap five months ago when I ordered it but it seemed worth a try - and I really like it. The elastic fabric and the separate piece for the seat cushions mean that it always stays fitted and doesn't rumple up and come untucked. There's enough substance to the fabric that I don't feel like it's going to tear. I haven't washed it yet but it seems like it'll be fine in cold water.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fit and look.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover. I have a barrel style chair with seat cushion and it fit it perfectly. Our dog loves to sit around my husband's neck whenever he's in this chair and although our dog doesn't shed, she still can carry dirt. This is a nice soft material and still allows the chair to look very nice. I do not have the cover fitted as tight as it can go on the pictures below, but it gives you the idea of how it covers a barrel style chair.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love that these come in 2 pieces, one for the couch frame and one for the cushions. It ensures a good fit. They have great staying power, no slip at all. They look very nice and work great even on leather. If you have a pet you can vacuum these covers no problem. It's easy to take them off and wash them, as well. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Winnow Bevy

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit t-shaped cushion
customer_reviews.text: Several of these reviews mentioned that it fits oversized armchairs with t-cushions. My experience was the complete opposite. I have an ugly brown hand-me-down Ashley Furniture armchair and it barely made it's way into this slipcover. The armchair part fit fine and it actually had a bit of excess fabric left over which you can easily tuck in. The second piece (the cushion cover) was square shaped, very small and tight so it actually kind of deformed the "T" shape of my cushion. The ends of the "T" shape curled in, and it ended up looking like a stuffed umbrella, lol. I had to return it, which made me give it 1 star because the return process was seamless!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Decent do-over for an old sofa!
customer_reviews.text: When I was first putting this on the couch it seemed like it would be way too big and flimsy. But once it was on it actually has a nice crisp look and talks into edges of cushions very well. That said the softness is nice but I wonder how it will hold up over time. I am returning mine today as the “dark grey” color is more like blue with a grayish tent rather than dark gray. It looks like a dirty denim wash color. Clashes with all the greige and beige as it’s in the cool blue tones. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Ami Ami

customer_reviews.title: Turned a couch I hated, into one I love
customer_reviews.text: This slipcover has changed our couch for the better! I hate the patterned fabric of our couch but hate buying slipcovers that don't fit well and have to be adjusted every time someone sits down. THIS slipcover has changed everything! It has a bit of excess fabric on the backside of the couch, (perhaps our couch has an odd shape) but pushed up against a wall and using safety pins to create a better fit on the sides has made it perfect. I love that there is a separate cover for the cushions. Buy this slipcover!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with the way this looks on my great grandma's ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the way this looks on my great grandma's couch. It's a great couch just out dated. I've never used a slipcover before & it was very easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: beth zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, my sofa is 92 inches long and does not have a high back rest but because if the stretchy material, the sofa size fitted well and i was able to fold the extra backrest without showing any wrinkles. My pictures will speak for the product itself.... looks like it’s the original sofa and it fits like a glove. It matches the ottoman cover that I purchased from the same company as shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It's also easy to wash and isn't tattered or bunchy when it ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm wary of buying furniture covers online because it's difficult to tell color, size/fit, and texture. However, this met our needs perfectly! The two piece concept keeps the cover in place with minimal tucking adjustments. The only times we have to re-tuck is if we have a Netflix binger and haven't moved from the couch in hours. It's also easy to wash and isn't tattered or bunchy when it comes out of the dryer. Also the navy color completely hides the dark green floral print underneath. Can't even tell it's a grandma couch! I would definitely buy this cover again!
customer_reviews.author: Khall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protecting from pets and changing rooms
customer_reviews.text: Wow this was great! We have tried covers before and weren’t too expectant on the quality and fit. But we were pleasantly surprised by this product! You can’t tell it’s a cover (which means it doesn’t look tacky)! The color has stayed true even after several washings and the feel of the material is still soft (we have dogs who believe the furniture is theirs). Also, it has been able to resist liquids, protecting our furniture from stains and spills as well as pet orders. I really love how easy the covers are to put on and take ifff, and that there is no slipping in between. I’m going to order another color to give our rooms some change 🤪
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Schleigh

customer_reviews.title: Has a blue tint
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on and they fit my couches perfect. I had an ugly brown colored couch and wanted to do a gray to match my living room better. However, the dark gray gives off a blue tint so I’m a little disappointed with that. Otherwise I would’ve given 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit On Two Different Sized Loveseats!
customer_reviews.text: I love this slipcover! I have two loveseats that needed one, but I wasn't sure I would be happy with it. So, I ordered one last Friday and received it Sunday. After seeing how nice it looked, I ordered another one straight away. It came today which is Tuesday! Lightning quick shipping! Also, one of our loveseats is smaller than the other, so I was concerned about it looking too stretched out on the bigger one. Nope! Looks great on both!
customer_reviews.author: JennWinn

customer_reviews.title: I used the couch cover with separate cushion covers
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this but I also bought three seat cushions by the same company. I wish they offered this couch cover with the option to get individual cushion covers but they don't so I used the couch cover then used the individual covers for the cushions. Yes it costs more but I think it's worth it.couch covers look like couch covers they never look just right but it's cheap compared to a new couch so it's good enough. For us pet lovers and parents and messy people it's a compromise we make. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to cover up a sofa that my siblings and I grew up destroying as our favorite pastime. We’ve since replaced the entire set but kept the sofa as my grandmother’s personal seat. I felt like making it a bit more pleasant for her and this product has checked all of the boxes. More importantly, she couldn’t be more pleased with the aesthetics and feel. I had the whole family wondering how I “knew what to buy”!
customer_reviews.author: Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Received used covers!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are extremely disappointed in the product we received. The cover appeared to have been previously used- it was covered in debris and seemed overly stretched and wrinkled. The seams are coming unraveled- all documented in the photos. I’ve ordered the same cover in a different color very recently and the packaging and quality in which this cover arrived was not the same as that one. It has clearly been used and repackaged. It also appears as though the color is off between the couch and cushion covers. Overall very upset with this, I’ve appreciated the covers we’ve received in the past and this falls far below our expectations. Will be seeking a refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to make your couch last
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because our toddler and his cars have done a number on our couch. We didnt think there was a point to buying a new couch til he was a hit older. This makes our couch look a little nicer and will hopefully help keep it alive for another year or two. We've had this for a few days now. My kids are on and off that couch all day, the extra cover for the cushions helps keep the cover in place. We aren't constantly tucking the cover back in to place. Getting the cover on was simple, we didnt have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: kolohe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing. I thought the cushion cover was gonna have a zipper, but it is like a fitted sheet that goes over them. Which I actually prefer. Also I used this on a sleeper sofa so I cut the part where the bed comes out so I don't have to remove the whole cover to use the bed. I put snaps on it. Even with that cut it still fits and stays on.
customer_reviews.author: M. Elsey

customer_reviews.title: The BEST slip covers on the market...guaranteed!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about how wonderful these slip covers are. I purchased the sofa and love seat in dark gray, and a chair in a floral print to compliment. They are far superior to all I have tried over the years. Sure fit, etc. Simple to fit, looks beautiful... people keep asking me if I got new furniture. Best of all... super durable with 5 crazy Felines ripping chasing each other, clawing and jumping all over the furniture. So far, not one snag or hole in the fabric. I am shocked! Now I only have them over 1 month... but they are wonderful.. do not hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Emmie

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Nice color.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the dark magenta. It’s a pretty color. It fit my t cushion fairly well. The only thing is I did not measure the depth of my cushion. Mine is 29” and the cushion cover is 25”-27”. But I made it work anyway. My pillows cover the back part of the seam. I’m not sure if it will stay on with usage. We’ll see. Overall it’s a nice cover. It would work perfectly if I had a standard size couch. It is definitely a hair and/or fuzz magnet. So be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is misleading
customer_reviews.text: So sizing is a little wonky. following the size chart I ordered a large sofa cover. I fit it as best I could on my couch but it did not cover the whole piece. I am disappointed as I have to get an extra large couch cover but they don't even have the color I need and I am paying an extra 10-15 dollars for the extra large when their sizing in incorrect. I really liked the texture and so I am pretty disappointed. I will probably be looking for different sellers on Amazon. I would suggest if you want to buy from this seller that you go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: Totally blown away
customer_reviews.text: OMG........PERFECT! I have searched for months while remodeling our farmhouse to find slipcovers for my old dirty Broyhill couch and love seat for suitable seating in guess we have guests. I researched style, color, size and price. My husband and I are speechless.......there are no words! No one would guess they are slipcovers! My due diligence paid off! These slipcovers are exactly as described and fit ACCORDING to picture and specifications! I bought these because of the furniture pictured - most similar to my sofa and love seat! Yippee! I am one over-excited happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect on my Couch, At first glance you can't tell there's a cover
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I got the cover cause I have a cat who just sheds on EVERYTHING. This cover puts up with the cat's hair, is easy to clean (I just use a Bissell Hand Vacuum to clean up a couple times a week (usually before someone comes over), and actually looks good. I mixed some red throw pillows to offset the grey, and it matches the room's colors nicely. I've had it for about a half of year now, and it's still holding up well. Even after a few washes, it's kept it's fit.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M

customer_reviews.title: Looks okay for like a day after putting on but gets holes all over
customer_reviews.text: Material is soft but so thin and with the texture of the fabric when it stretches to fit a sofa (even one that the slipcover has lots of extra fabric to tuck in) its supers thin in between the raised square textures and little tiny holes form all over this slipcover that only get bigger!! Don't waste your money, not sure why they would make a slip cover out of such thin delicate fabric. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, even with the puffy couch arms
customer_reviews.text: I love this two-piece slipcover!! My husband had a couch from Craigslist that he used in his apartment that he shared with a roommate, and we just had it in the playroom. It had tears on the cushion corners and the surface was overall worn and gross (still very plush and supportive though)! I bought this slipcover and my mom asked me if I had purchased a new couch! It makes all the difference and makes our couch look brand new. I was weary buying it because the couch has the puffy arms, but it fits really well for the price. I bought some lamps and new throw pillows and I achieved an affordable updated look to our playroom.
customer_reviews.author: Rlynniv

customer_reviews.title: Cover is damaged and it smells like a wet dog!
customer_reviews.text: I never write bad reviews, but this made me upset. I needed this item for a party I was having and I opened the package only to find it has a whole in it!! Not happy. Overall, it would be a nice couch cover, if it wasn't damaged. Edit: This was a returned item! It smells like a wet dog! I'm contacting the seller and getting a replacement and I want my money back. Very dissatisfied😠😠😠
customer_reviews.author: Kraftykone

customer_reviews.title: The product was just as promised, beautiful and l look l have a new couch, thank you!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new look for my couch, it's in excellent condition, but was getting tired of the color ( aqua). The cover completely hides the color and is so soft. The cover went on very easily and looks beautiful. Love the texture on the cover reminds me of a soft tshirt. Will be definitely ordering another cover for my smaller chair. Very happy with my purchase. I haven't washed it yet so not sure how it will wash up but lm not worried, l feel it will come out great. The price was crazy good, l could have never found something like this in a store for that price!!😆. Thank you...
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, fits well, difficult to put on
customer_reviews.text: Color (dark aqua) is beautiful but there were no instructions or markings on how to apply. It took quite awhile to figure out how to get this to fit on my chair. Once I did, it fits great and I really like it. I've only had it on there a couple of weeks. We will see how well it holds up, over time, with my dog
customer_reviews.author: FLbleubelle

customer_reviews.title: My cat destroyed the covering on my sofa plus the last sofa cover which was brown and showed everything and always looked dirty long over due replacing
customer_reviews.text: What a change in looks! I wasn't sure on the dark cyan but after I finally got it on the color pick up some other greens that I didn't notice before. It's kinda a mossy green color. My cat destroyed the covering on my sofa plus the last sofa cover which was brown and showed everything and always looked dirty long over due replacing. This cover looks great being 2 pieces, and has a little square pattern to it so it doesn't look just plain. So hoping my cat is done working over my sofa if not these are priced right and will get another one!
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for covering dark colored couches
customer_reviews.text: Took my $50 thrift store couch and elevated it to new heights! Was really concerned the red color would be difficult to conceal, but this slip cover did the job perfectly! It was stretchy, but still very snug. I highly recommend using some upholstery pins, just to add another level of security for keeping things in place, but honestly you could probably go without. Already getting compliments!
customer_reviews.author: ShannDizzle

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these covers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my guesthouse to cover some very old, but comfortable furniture. Very happy with these covers. Once you figure out the orientation, they were quite easy to put on myself. These were purchased over a year ago and have been washed several times and still look new. Since my furniture is large and over stuffed, I bought the extra long cover for the sofa and a sofa size for the loveseat. They fit very well. I ordered another set for “just in case”.
customer_reviews.author: Penni C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for homes with pets
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs that shed like no other! We also tend to be a little crumby when it comes to eating. The two pieces make it easy to dust out the crumbs without having to toss them all over the floor. It also helps our bottom cushions stay put. I had a bit of difficulty figuring out which side was which when I was first attempting the large piece. I did figure it out and it has since been a breeze. It is super easy to wash and dry. There aren't any holes, snags, or tears and we've had it for several months now.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Predmore

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have the love seat using it on a chair and a half. Fits perfect. Ottoman cover almost fits, I might staple it down. Went on easy and quick. I read the reviews that the dark gray looks like a Dusty blue which is what I wanted. And I agree it can pass for blue I see gray though. But two people said nice blue chair so somewhere in between. I am very very very pleased what the fit and how it looks
customer_reviews.author: Christinexoxodillon

customer_reviews.title: Fail!
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed at the fit even though I measured and got the “correct size”. The cushion part is not wide enough, had to buy clips so it would not lift and the top part is way too big. Maybe it is just not meant for every couch. It is hard to clean even after a wash with strong detergent, I still see the same stains. I use it in my toddlers room so it is mainly liquids like milk or juice nothing strong. Would not recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Karakollukcu

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but.....
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on, the stretch is perfect and works with you, not against you. I orderesld the yellow green which is a more subtle color in the swatches. This is Chartreuse which is a very bright green. I will make it work but just know that the color is not true to the swatches provided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Color was more red than I expected, but over all, I like the way it looks and the feel. Until I went to put the cushion cover on and found a hole. Very disappointed. If it came with a hole, I doubt it'll stand up to kids. It wasnt hard to put on and the main cover was easy to get to fit. But id you have full cushions, it'll be a bit difficult getting them to fit. i was able to get them to fit eventually, but I'm thinking it'll end up shifting.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit a 3 seater
customer_reviews.text: The back part fit fine, but the seat cover definitely isn't made for 3 seats😐 I had to stretch it really far to get it to fit like this. I would have loved it if the seat cover fit. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Good quality- meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: I think they look pretty good. Hopefully they hold up well against my students. They came in two different shades, so they don’t match exactly- but since it is for my classroom it’s okay.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Reshy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these couch covers!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sofa covers! Sooo much cheaper and easier than buying new furniture. My mom loved my wine colored ones so much I got her couches some in Grey! These couches have oversized cushions so I got one in XL and the second one in Large. Great fit and super easy to put on. Might have to try it a couple ways before you figure the placement but after that, you are good to go! True to color they arent super dark and with a very slight tint of blue but it looks true to gray when put on. And the wine colored ones are true to color too! Absolutely love them!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Red back tag goes on back edge. NOT the middle.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Looks like I have a brand new couch. I wanted a gray color and not my tan colored and my dog keeps getting it looking all gross and I hate to clean it all the time so i thought why not get this? Well I'm loving it. And to wash just take it off and toss it in the washer. No more steam cleaning my couch. And a little advice the red back tag goes on back edge. Not the middle. Learned the hard way. It was a pain but once you get it. It's well worth it. And by the way my dog loves his new dog bed. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Finley

customer_reviews.title: Fit near perfect
customer_reviews.text: Definitley love how this product looks. I ordered the large (sofa) in gray. The only thing is I would've loved if the gray was a darker grey similar to that of the picture. This grey was lighter and blueish. It's no big deal I still love the way it looks, the material is soft and stretchy. Since I just got it, I'm unsure of the durability however, ive bought a similar product of very similar texture and material and it lasted about 2 years after a ton of washes and three dogs. I have a 3 seater sofa. Now in search of new pillow covers.
customer_reviews.author: Lid

customer_reviews.title: Transformed my chair
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had pics of my old slipcover, it was a damask print and was oversized and tie-back...just very bulky. This slipcover was so great I bought one for my sofa as well. It's a great, snug fit and the dove color is just a good mix of green/grey muted tones. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice alternative to reupholstering old furniture. I'm not a fan of the pattern or the color. The gray pictured is a bit different than what arrived. It does have a red tag on the back that says 'BACK' but that's about all they give you as far as 'installing.' It took me numerous tries to figure out how to put it on. It does look like a slip cover unfortunately but with enough pillows I think it will be fine
customer_reviews.author: Eggs&Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to order these sofa covers as we couldn't afford to get brand new furniture and I knew that our current furniture still had a lot of life left in it. Once I put them on, I was do pleased with how they looked and felt. However, not even 3 days of having the cover on, one hole appeared. Now a couple weeks later, there are several little holes throughout. I am very disappointed in this product and would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bryanna Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Quick Fix, Nice Fit, Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: Overall very pleased with the look, fit & quality. My 8 month old chenille sofa was ripped up by my dog and this gave it a fresh start! Only 2 issues. First, there wasn’t much indication of what went where but I got it on the second try. And second, I wish the cushion cover went all the way around. It fits like a fitted sheet and maneuvering it with 3 cushions inside was a challenge since the bottom side was completely open. A little more coverage on the bottom of the cushions would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: MSD

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to figure out first time, but good product.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to breath life into an old couch. Also, the neon pink wasn't going to gel with the rest of the furniture I had. It's a little awkward to figure out just how it lays over the couch just right the first time. After that, it's much simpler to place back in the future after you launder it. The cloth is soft, but textured. So far I have washed it every 1-2 weeks since getting it 2 months ago and it still looks/feels the same as when I got it. Overall, really satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith D.

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: Worth the money for a 2 piece
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Worth the money to get a 2 piece cover. I couldn't be happier compared to my old one piece cover that always made my couch look like a mess. Fabric is soft too. Update 15 months later: Still love this couch cover. The ability to replace just the seating part really makes this couch cover worth while. The first one did get a couple holes after about 7 months. They were very small, and likely caused by my cat. A few minutes with a needle and thread fixed them up until I bought a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Anthelion

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Couch cover amazing. It's easy to take off and on to throw in wash. The part that goes over cushions only covers the top and edges, which i thought I wouldn't like but in fact I love it. Literally just pull it off to clean in wash. If you have kids or pets this is great.. You cant tell it's even cover. People thought I bought a new couch. It stays in place very well. I've had to pulled down the back and readjust but only due to two young wild children:)
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Hoping for better
customer_reviews.text: The cushion part is borderline too small but the rest of the cover fits fine. Less than a month in and it has a hole in the cushion portion. 😟 Over all its a great option for a cover but maybe I think I need a bigger size for the cushion part.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Smith

customer_reviews.title: I've bought two and they both get little holes in the bottom after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.text: This fits the couch really well. I thought maybe my dryer was putting holes in my first one, so I bought a replacement. But, even air drying the second one I ended up with little holes that due to the stretchy-ness of the material, get bigger and bigger after a few months. Don't waste your money if you expect this to last with wear from people or pets.
customer_reviews.author: FreckledFox09

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the navy blue color. I had no problem at all getting the covers on my couches. I am also very pleased at how well the covers stay on. I've had them about a month now and I haven't had a single issue with them sliding up or coming off. So the fit is great. My only complaint is the material is thin and not very durable. I have 2 cats and their claws, even trimmed short, easily catch the fabric and put holes in the material.
customer_reviews.author: K. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: The best cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover. My awkward shaped sofa was hard to cover. With the cats, it's constantly moving. This stays in place, looks amazing, and is a very sturdy material. I will buy another to keep as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: baker

customer_reviews.title: I'm really disappointed because everything else about it (other than the stain ...
customer_reviews.text: I think they may have given me loveseat sized cushion covers. It just doesn't fit! There's no possible way. It doesn't go all the way around the cushions and I can't get it over one of the edges. I'm really disappointed because everything else about it (other than the stain that's already on the top of the cushion cover - and no, it wasn't used, it was new), was great! The fabric is nicer than expected, the fit on the main couch part was great. What a bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Lady of Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Have had this on the chair for 5 months. It fit very well with great stretch and continues to fit perfectly. I like it. We got the bluish color. When you sit in the chair the cover is tight and does not move or shift. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: RobertM

customer_reviews.title: I like this product a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. It fits our couch, per the appropriate sizing, but there are just some spots where it looks a little odd, in part because my couch has removable back-pillows. I had more than a small fight getting the seat cushions in the cover. I combined this with the heavy duty sofa shield to guard against my drooly puppy, and the combination works great.
customer_reviews.author: RandomShopper

customer_reviews.title: True to color
customer_reviews.text: The dark cyan is true to color. Typically I would be happy with this but I read reviews that said the dark cyan was actually more blue which is what I was hoping for. With the blues in our house the dark cyan really clashed and looked very green. The fit was pretty good though. The only (minor) issue was the cover for the seat cushions - I wish it was just a bit bigger to wrap around the cushions better. We returned this cover within about an hour of receiving it, but will probably be ordering a different color as it seems to be the best fit at a reasonable price on the market right now.
customer_reviews.author: Finn

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a brand new couch but with 3 kids and 2 dogs, keeping it stain free and fur free was a challenge so we decided to cover it for now. These covers are great. It’s a perfect true white which is a bit hard to find for sofa covers. Our couch is quite overstuffed and it was difficult putting on the seat covers but we managed. Not sure if it’ll shrink though once we wash it and if it does, that’s going to be a problem. But for now, it’s all good. Goes well with our decor and was relatively easy to wipe clean when our dog left paw mud marks on it.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: WOW WOW WOW!! Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so skeptical to buy these at first based on the bad reviews but I am absolutely in love with these!! I was in severe need of a makeover and these did the job!! They arrived super fast and as soon as I received them I washed them and put them on wet. I did struggle at first trying to figure out how they went on but it was smooth sailing when I did. It only took about 5 minutes to put the second one on. I highly recommend these!!!! I purchased a sofa and loveseat cover in black.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Kingsolver

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the matching cover for our ottoman and they look great! A simple cold water wash after opening the package and they were ready to go. There are two pieces to this set - one fits over the seat cushion, the other fits over the entire chair. They were easy to apply to our furniture and just as easy to remove for cleaning. An inexpensive way to update our decor without breaking the bank. It's comfy too.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great contemporary color
customer_reviews.text: Great color!!!! It's about time makets acknowledge that customers want current colors. Currently the hot colors are pink green and blue in strong hot colors and cover makers r still making brown and beige. Great to finally have a current choice. Wears will easy to clean great color but not impervious to pet claws.
customer_reviews.author: Jersrcit

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work for me since it didn’t stretch.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this items for my leather sofa and it didn’t fit but didn’t stretch neither, so I had to return it and I ended up buying another brand that did stretch. But if you are looking for a sofa cover within this measurement it may works for you. It’s just my sofa was to big for this measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Neat Couch Cover
customer_reviews.text: The couch cover is very comfortable nice to the touch. However, it wasn't easy to get onto the couch and didn't exactly cover my cushions that well. However, it does it well enough that I definitely happy that I bought it. I've had no issues with the cover falling off which is why I bought this as a replacement for my old couch cover. Definitely would recommend, especially for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Crispy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it comes in two pieces. I don’t have to keep repositioning it. We have an 80 inch sofa, and it fits perfectly. Not sure if the sofa was bigger how it would be, but it does have some extra fabric to use. It is so much nicer than my dog couch cover. It is a great way to test if we want a gray couch in the future. It is holding up to big dog use. It does collect dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Used for RV sofa
customer_reviews.text: Used in for RV sofa. Material seemed to tear fairly easy. It feels like it's made of thin knit cotton-like fabric. Something you'd expect a stretch shirt to be made out of. Fits well to a small sofa (little but larger than an average loveseat).
customer_reviews.author: Max W.

customer_reviews.title: Working well for me
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cover and been using it for about 6 weeks and I really like it. I've washed it once and it held up fine. We use this on our couch to protect it from our 60 and 70 pound dogs who refuse to realize the couch isn't for them. The only issue I have is that the couch has three cushions and the cushion cover only covers 2 of the cushions. I plan on ordering another cover so that when I wash one, the other is on the couch. When I order another I'll go up to the next size up (the largest in this case.) Overall I am really pleased with the cover so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: CHUN YI Stretch Loveseat Sofa Slipcover 2-Piece Couch Cover Furniture Protector, 2 Seater Coat Soft with Elastic Bottom, Checks Spandex Jacquard Fabric, Medium, Gray
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR FABRIC: 85% polyester 15% spandex fabric makes our sofa covers more stretchy and durable, ensuring both good function and comfort. Various adorable colors are available to decorate your sofa. Having such a sofa cover not only protects your sofa from spills and stains, but also gives your sofa a new rejuvenated look if your sofa looks a bit broken or not so new.

FIT JUST RIGHT: Small size is suitable for sofa length between 32"-47". Medium size is suitable for sofa length between 57"-70". Large size is suitable for sofa length between 72"-92".X-Large size is suitable for sofa length between 92"-118". Our sofa covers are stretchy to fit various kinds of sofas like lawson sofa, T-cushion sofa, chesterfield sofa, leather sofa and so on. If you are not sure about how to choose, contact us and we will help you with all our heart.

STAY IN PLACE: Our sofa cover can cover the back of your sofa, providing all-round protection. Tuck the fabric into the grooves to make it more tight and the elasticized bottom will secure the slipcover stay in place firmly. 1 Package contains 1 sofa cover and 1 cushion cover. For detailed installation steps, please check our attached video.

EFFORTLESS CARE: Not only will our sofa cover protect your sofa from accidental dirt like biscuit crumbs and daily wear and tear, but also it is very easy to clean, saving you much effort. Machine washable with similar colors. Do Not Bleach. For drying, tumble dry low and remove them promptly from dryer.

TIPS: With a brief style and appealing colors, our slipcovers match well for your most different styles of furniture and decoration. Due to the diverse light and monitor display, colors may slightly differ from picture and product, but we never stop trying our best to reduce the color difference between picture and product to the minimum as far as possible.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars935 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
